sql:execute-query.sql:query: SELECT a.Name name, a.PCode pcode, a.resp resp, a.papid, a.valid, a.insidebar, a.viewsidebar, p.PCode papcode FROM tblpagine a LEFT JOIN tblpagine p on a.PaPID=p.PID where a.PID=
select Name,PCode, priority from tblpagine where PaPID= order by priority,Name
select Username, PermissionCode from tblroles where PID=
